resources.string: Select country code if it differs from yours
Show part of message when alerted
Hi. Let\'s keep in touch using ChatON. %s
Failed to close chat. Network error occurred
Chat and trunk will be deleted
This chat room has been closed on another device
Maximum number of buddies (%d) reached in Favorites
Group chat can be used with up to %d buddies
Broadcast can be used with up to %d buddies
You can select up to %d buddies
All buddies already invited to this chat
Error occurred. Birthday not saved in Calendar
Failed to block buddy. Network error occurred
Buddy blocked or buddy information not found
Turn on GPS in Settings to use GPS tag
File size exceeds maximum upload limit
%s is not your buddy yet. Add to buddy list?
Unable to start camera during call
%s sent you a message and an image
%s sent you a message and a video
%s sent you a message and an Anicon
%s sent you a message and an Animessage
Unable to find your location. Try again
New version available. Update to continue
Unable to edit Animessage. Not supported by this version of ChatON
Unable to load Animessage. Not supported by this version of ChatON
File size exceeds maximum upload limit
Some content may have been removed. It cannot be displayed after upgrading
Unable to edit. Version has been updated. File can still be played. Play?
Maximum number of phone numbers (%d) exceeded
Buddy\'s information has changed. Retry chat via buddy list
I\'m using ChatON to keep in touch with my buddies. Come and discover features that you\'ve never seen before. See you on ChatON!
I\'m using ChatON to keep in touch with buddies. Discover features that you\'ve never seen before. Visit www.ChatON.com for more details.
Pop-ups inform you when messages arrive
%s\'s information has changed. Retry chat via buddy list
Selected buddies are not allowed to see your PostON
Your PostON will not be visible to selected buddies
Sign in to your Samsung account
All ChatON users can see and search for your phone number
No ChatON users can see or search for your phone number
Synchronize contacts in my device with ChatON buddies
Allows message notifications when you are not using ChatON
Number already in use. Register again with another number
%s already in use. Enter another name
The interaction rank tells you how often you chat with your buddies. You have not interacted with your buddies yet. Try to chat with your buddies
Verification code sent to number below.\n%s
%s are not your buddies yet. Add to buddy list?
You will receive an automatic call from ChatON. Use the %1$d-digit number you hear during the call to activate your ChatON account. Example voice: Your ChatON code is %2$s. Again %3$s. Thank you
I would like my birthday to be visible to all ChatON users
%s will be reported to the ChatON spam response team
You are not currently using buddy suggestions. Enable buddy suggestions by going to Settings
If you have forgotten your password, you need to delete your ChatON account. All data will be deleted
You can select up to %d images at a time
Tap the button above to download Anicons
Send messages using the enter key on your keyboard
Not enough memory. Delete some items in device memory and try again.
Size of all message files exceeds maximum upload limit. Only the most recent message files will be attached
Your chat history is attached to this message as %s
Receive alerts when invited to new group chats
Post invitation card on my wall
Voice calls and messaging are not supported
Tweet invitation message to my timeline
Send invitation message to my timeline
The friends below are your Facebook friends and also ChatON users. Add them to your buddy list?
The friends below are your Twitter friends and also ChatON users. Add them to your buddy list?
The friends below are your Weibo friends and also ChatON users. Add them to your buddy list?
After you chat with your buddies, the list of chats will be shown
No applications available to open files
Turns the send button into the walkie talkie button
I would like to be suggested to other people
I would like to receive buddy suggestions from ChatON
Ignore all people you may know and do not show suggestions again
Add all people you may know to your buddies list?
Buddy suggestions will be shown 24 hours after you sign up
You have reached your daily voice verification limit. Try voice verification again in %d hours
You have reached your daily SMS verification limit. Try SMS verification again in %d hours
Failed to verify registration. If you skip now, push notifications will be automatically registered later
Verification code expired. Start process again
Today\'s chats will be counted towards tomorrow\'s interaction rank and points
No pictures are available on the device
If you ignore %s, they will not be suggested again
All messages will be sent as a text file
To see this content, you must install %s. Install and try again
A buddy’s account information is currently being changed. Try later
Buddy\'s account information has changed. Send the message?
%s is not a buddy. Be careful if this user requests private information or money from you
%s may not be your buddy. Be careful if this user requests private information or money from you
%s is not an identified user. Be careful if this user requests private information or money from you
You need to install a viewer for this document
ChatON is free to use. However, accessing a network service may incur additional charges
Enter a Samsung account Email address
Jump to a conversation with the selected recipient
Jump to your buddies page to select a chat recipient
Send a message to the selected recipient via ChatON
All ChatON users can see and search for your Samsung account
This is your current profile picture. If you delete this picture your profile picture will revert to the default image
Maximum number of profile pictures reached. Delete an image to upload a new one
Notifies you of your buddies\' birthdays
You can only record a message for up to %1$d minutes. Only the first %2$d minutes of your message will be sent
Synchronizing. Please wait...\n\nIt may take a long time to synchronize. Do not turn off the device or press the home key while syncing
All ChatON users can see your profile picture
Only your buddies can see your profile picture
No ChatON users can see or search for your Samsung account
Samsung account synchronizing with ChatON. Try later
ChatON is a global communication service that enables you to have better relationships with your buddies individually or in groups
This will sync all your received and sent messages on all connected devices
%1$d devices are already connected. Disconnect a device by going to the settings at %2$s
Sync failed. Check your network connection and try again
%1$d/%2$d people have been added to your buddies list
All your ChatON data will be deleted from this device. However, you can restore all your buddies, chats, and profile data by syncing with your Samsung account
Tap and hold the walkie talkie button to record a message, then release to send it
%s has been disabled. Enable it under Settings > Applications manager
Enter your area code and then your phone number. E.g. area code: 11, phone number: 1234 5678. Do not enter your country code. You will receive a %d-digit verification code via SMS
Let\'s make our chats more than just words!\n\nCheck out ChatON\'s creative features at %s
Unable to connect to your Samsung account. Try later
Unable to chat in this chat room
Cannot load older messages. Messages are only kept for %d days.
The downloaded item has been applied
You can access your chat list, buddy list, and profile data from all connected devices by signing in to your Samsung account
Sign in to your Samsung account?
All chat rooms will be deleted
Send a download link to your friends so they can install ChatON
Select your friends\' country or region code
After you block buddies in buddies list, blocked buddies will be shown
Sign in to your Samsung account to make calls
Who will be your first buddy?
Share your photos and videos with chat participants
Loading previous messages. It may take a while...
Enjoy ChatON on all your devices
You can have high quality video and voice chats with registered ChatON Voice & Video Chat users
Sign in with SNS account or skip
Already signed in to Samsung account
Enter your real name so your friends can recognize you easily

Sync your contacts to receive messages from buddies who have your phone number. Add buddies automatically by syncing your contacts. You will automatically be added to the buddy list of any user who has your phone number saved on their device.
New version is ready to be installed. Install now?
You can add and chat with buddies from your SNS accounts. To add more buddies, select Buddies > Add buddy > Suggestions.
All contacts will be imported and added as buddies
Use of these ChatON services is governed by the ChatON Terms and conditions and Privacy policy
The ChatON logo is different for Canada
The terms and conditions and the privacy policy have been updated. Accept?
You have signed up for a Samsung account. From now on, you can send free messages on ChatON using your Samsung account.
Animessages may be shown as still images in applications other than ChatON
Tap the + button to create Animessages
Delete chat rooms not used within the last 3 months
Performance may decrease when there are over 100 chat rooms. Delete some chat rooms.
Chat rooms not used within the last %d months will be deleted
Old chat rooms have been deleted
Failed to delete old chat rooms
Use the enter key to send
After you hide buddies from the buddy list, they will be shown here
Pop-up notification type while is screen on
Tap here to use auto back up to back up your future chats
Selected backed up chats will be deleted
View the chats you backed up before you last reinstalled ChatON
Unable to back up your chats. There is no SD card inserted in your device.
This password is required to restore this data once it is backed up. If you forget this password, you will not be able to access this backup data.
Change the password for backing up
To use auto backup and back up now, set a password
All chats will be backed up to your device automatically at %d AM. If you have to reinstall ChatON, you will be able to view your backed up chats.
Unable to make calls via ChatON V while a call is being made via 3G. To make a call via ChatON V, end the 3G call
Tap the button above to download Animessages
After you make or receive a call, logs will be shown
The selected logs will be deleted
You can invite up to %d people
%s are not your buddies yet. Add to buddy list?
%1$s, %2$s are not your buddies yet. Add to buddies list?
No signal found for mobile networks
Data roaming is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable data roaming and try again
Mobile data is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead or enable mobile data and try again
A Wi-Fi network is not available. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Wi-Fi not available. Turn on Wi-Fi or disable Wi-Fi only
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Disable Flight mode and try again
Using mobile data when roaming will incur extra charges
First we need to verify your phone number. Select how to receive your verification code.
Find ChatON buddies from Contacts by registering your phone number
Still waiting? We\'ll try sending you another via
ChatON Voice & Video Chat is available for up to %d people
Maximum number of buddies invited to join the ChatON voice call (%d) has been exceeded
Maximum number of buddies invited to join the ChatON video call (%d) has been exceeded
Maximum number of buddies for the ChatON voice call (%d) has been exceeded
Maximum number of buddies for the ChatON video call (%d) has been exceeded
Your buddy\'s message will be translated from %1$s to %2$s
This content is currently not available in your country
ChatON LIVEpartner not supported on this device
Only files in %s formats are supported
ChatON Voice & Video Chat will be downloaded and installed so you can have voice and video chats
%1$d devices are already connected. Disconnect a device by changing the settings via www.chaton.com by going to Settings > Connected device.
Shows all the devices connected to this Samsung account. You can deregister devices via the PC website (www.chaton.com) by going to Settings > Connected devices.
This device was reset. Register it again to use it.

All of your ChatON/ChatON Voice & Video Chat data will be deleted from this device. However, you can restore your buddy list, chat list, and profile data by registering again with your Samsung account.
Phone number already registered to another device. If you proceed with the current device, all information about the previous device will be deleted. Continue with registration?
This device is already registered to the Samsung push service. You cannot receive push messages on any other devices.
This device has already been verified so registration will be skipped
Thank you for downloading ChatON Voice & Video Chat. You can have high quality voice and video chats with your buddies.
No chat history was found on the server
Buddies who have disabled show my number may not appear in the search results
Buddies who have disabled show my Samsung account may not appear in the search results
No content yet. Share your photos and videos with your buddies
The selected messages will be deleted
%s will be re-invited to this chat room
All data will be deleted if you close chat
Tap the + button to create stamps
%1$s has already been registered to this device. If you continue registering with %2$s, all information for the previous account will be deleted. Tap OK to continue.
%s has already been registered to another device. If you continue on this device, you will no longer be able to use ChatON on the other device. Tap OK to continue.
%s is already in use. Register again with another account.
After you add events in Calendar, they will be shown here
All ChatON users can see your profile picture and search for you. You can change who sees you in ChatON settings > Privacy
Tap and hold your cover image to change it
Unable to find application to perform this action
Share your day with your buddies by posting text, images, videos and location information as well as leaving comments
After you add a profile picture, it will be shown here
%s can only be used by the owner of the device
No emoticons or anicons to add
